Author: sadgorlthrowwaway
Text: Hi, I’m so sorry this is happening to you. I know this is unrelated, but as someone who is trying to recover, I really admire your will power. I’m so proud that you are eating intuitively and I’m SO PROUD that you are fighting urges that you know are disordered.   My only advise would be to surround yourself with recovery and HAES as much as possible. That’s what I’ve been trying to do lately and it’s helped a bit.
